info.name: Sandbox Gateway de Pagamento (Maxipago!)
info.description:
Coleção com os serviços disponíveis de Gateway de Pagamento.

[Clique aqui](https://www.maxipago.com/developers/) para acessar a documentação completa.

Esta coleção já contém variáveis, para visualiza-las clique no nome da coleção **Sandbox Gateway de Pagamento (Maxipago!)** e selecione a aba `Variables`.

body.raw:
<api-request>
    <verification>
        <merchantId>{{MerchantId}}</merchantId>
        <merchantKey>{{MerchantKey}}</merchantKey>
    </verification>
    <command>add-card-onfile</command>
    <request>
        <customerId>{{customer_id}}</customerId>
        <creditCardNumber>5555555555554444</creditCardNumber>
        <expirationMonth>12</expirationMonth>
        <expirationYear>2026</expirationYear>
        <billingName>Maxipago Brasil</billingName>
        <billingAddress1>Rua Marcos Penteado Ulhoa Rodrigues</billingAddress1>
        <billingAddress2>11 Andar</billingAddress2>
        <billingCity>Barueri</billingCity>
        <billingState>SP</billingState>
        <billingZip>06460-040</billingZip>
        <billingCountry>BR</billingCountry>
        <billingPhone>1121218536</billingPhone>
        <billingEmail>teste@teste.com</billingEmail>
    </request>
</api-request>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<transaction-request>
    <version>3.1.1.15</version>
    <verification>
        <merchantId>{{MerchantId}}</merchantId>
        <merchantKey>{{MerchantKey}}</merchantKey>
    </verification>
    <order>
        <sale>
            <processorID>1</processorID>
            <referenceNum>{{reference_num}}</referenceNum>
            <fraudCheck>N</fraudCheck>
            <ipAddress>192.168.0.10</ipAddress>
            <customerIdExt>466.741.946-62</customerIdExt>
            <billing>
                <name>Nome do comprador</name>
                <address>Rua teste, 0</address>
                <address2>11º Andar</address2>
                <district>Santo André</district>
                <city>São Paulo</city>
                <state>SP</state>
                <postalcode>00000-000</postalcode>
                <country>BR</country>
                <phone>(99) 99999-9999</phone>
                <email>teste@maxipago.com</email>
                <companyName>maxiPago!</companyName>
                <type>Individual</type>
                <gender>M</gender>
                <birthDate>1959-05-25</birthDate>
                <phones>
                    <phone>
                        <phoneType>Commercial</phoneType>
                        <phoneCountryCode>55</phoneCountryCode>
                        <phoneAreaCode>92</phoneAreaCode>
                        <phoneNumber>99999-9999</phoneNumber>
                        <phoneExtension>123</phoneExtension>
                    </phone>
                    <phone>
                        <phoneType>Mobile</phoneType>
                        <phoneCountryCode>55</phoneCountryCode>
                        <phoneAreaCode>99</phoneAreaCode>
                        <phoneNumber>99999-9999</phoneNumber>
                    </phone>
                </phones>
                <documents>
                    <document>
                        <documentType>CPF</documentType>
                        <documentValue>123.456.789-00</documentValue>
                    </document>
                    <document>
                        <documentType>RG</documentType>
                        <documentValue>12.345.678-9</documentValue>
                    </document>
                </documents>
            </billing>
            <shipping>
                <name>Nome do comprador</name>
                <address>Rua teste, 0</address>
                <address2>11º Andar</address2>
                <district>Santo André</district>
                <city>São Paulo</city>
                <state>SP</state>
                <postalcode>00000-000</postalcode>
                <country>BR</country>
                <phone>(99) 99999-9999</phone>
                <email>teste@maxipago.com</email>
                <type>Individual</type>
                <gender>M</gender>
                <birthDate>1959-05-25</birthDate>
                <phones>
                    <phone>
                        <phoneType>Commercial</phoneType>
                        <phoneCountryCode>55</phoneCountryCode>
                        <phoneAreaCode>92</phoneAreaCode>
                        <phoneNumber>99999-9999</phoneNumber>
                        <phoneExtension>123</phoneExtension>
                    </phone>
                    <phone>
                        <phoneType>Mobile</phoneType>
                        <phoneCountryCode>55</phoneCountryCode>
                        <phoneAreaCode>99</phoneAreaCode>
                        <phoneNumber>99999-9999</phoneNumber>
                    </phone>
                </phones>
                <documents>
                    <document>
                        <documentType>CPF</documentType>
                        <documentValue>123.456.789-00</documentValue>
                    </document>
                    <document>
                        <documentType>RG</documentType>
                        <documentValue>12.345.678-9</documentValue>
                    </document>
                </documents>
            </shipping>
            <transactionDetail>
                <payType>
                    <onFile>
                        <customerId>{{customer_id}}</customerId>
                        <token>{{token}}</token>
                    </onFile>
                </payType>
            </transactionDetail>
            <payment>
                <chargeTotal>10.00</chargeTotal>
                <shippingTotal>10.00</shippingTotal>
                <currencyCode>BRL</currencyCode>
                <softDescriptor>mx5</softDescriptor>
                <creditInstallment>
                    <numberOfInstallments>2</numberOfInstallments>
                    <chargeInterest>N</chargeInterest>
                </creditInstallment>
            </payment>
            <itemList itemCount="1">
                <item>
                    <itemIndex>1</itemIndex>
                    <itemProductCode>Product de Teste Um</itemProductCode>
                    <itemDescription>Certificacao de Integracao 01</itemDescription>
                    <itemQuantity>2</itemQuantity>
                    <itemTotalAmount>10.00</itemTotalAmount>
                    <itemUnitCost>5.00</itemUnitCost>
                </item>
            </itemList>
        </sale>
    </order>
</transaction-request>

item.name: Salvar o cartão automaticamente com Zero Dollar - Approved

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<transaction-request>
    <version>3.1.1.15</version>

                <country>BR</country>
                <phone>(99) 99999-9999</phone>

                <type>Individual</type>
                <gender>M</gender>
                <birthDate>1959-05-25</birthDate>
                <phones>
                    <phone>
                        <phoneType>Commercial</phoneType>
                        <phoneCountryCode>55</phoneCountryCode>
                        <phoneAreaCode>92</phoneAreaCode>
                        <phoneNumber>99999-9999</phoneNumber>
                        <phoneExtension>123</phoneExtension>
                    </phone>
                    <phone>
                        <phoneType>Mobile</phoneType>
                        <phoneCountryCode>55</phoneCountryCode>
                        <phoneAreaCode>99</phoneAreaCode>
                        <phoneNumber>99999-9999</phoneNumber>
                    </phone>
                </phones>

                        <documentType>CPF</documentType>
                        <documentValue>123.456.789-00</documentValue>
                    </document>
                    <document>
                        <documentType>RG</documentType>
                        <documentValue>12.345.678-9</documentValue>
                    </document>
                </documents>
            </shipping>
            <transactionDetail>
                <payType>
                    <creditCard>
                        <number>5111111111111100</number>
                        <expMonth>12</expMonth>

                </payType>
            </transactionDetail>
            <payment>

item.name: Criação de ordem de Pagamento - Recorrente - Approved

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<api-request>
    <verification>
        <merchantId>{{MerchantId}}</merchantId>
        <merchantKey>{{MerchantKey}}</merchantKey>
    </verification>
    <command>add-payment-order</command>
    <request>
        <referenceNum>{{reference_num}}</referenceNum>
        <consumerAuthentication>N</consumerAuthentication>
        <fraudCheck>N</fraudCheck>
        <billing>
            <email>teste@maxipago.com</email>
            <firstName>Teste</firstName>
            <lastName>Maxipay</lastName>
        </billing>
        <transactionDetail>
            <description>Pagamento Parcela Do caminhao</description>
            <comments>Pagar ate dia 30</comments>
            <emailSubject>Favor efetuar o pagamento</emailSubject>
            <expirationDate>{{expiration_date}}</expirationDate>
            <acceptPix>N</acceptPix>
            <payType>
                <creditCard>
                    <processorID>1</processorID>
                    <operation>sale</operation>
                    <numberOfInstallments>12</numberOfInstallments>
                    <currencyCode>BRL</currencyCode>
                    <amount>952.28</amount>
                </creditCard>
            </payType>
        </transactionDetail>
        <recurring>
            <startDate>{{start_date}}</startDate>
            <period>monthly</period>
            <numberOfInstallments>12</numberOfInstallments>
            <failureThreshold>3</failureThreshold>
            <amount>952.28</amount>
        </recurring>
    </request>
</api-request>

<transaction-request>
    <version>3.1.1.15</version>
    <verification>
        <merchantId>{{MerchantId}}</merchantId>
        <merchantKey>{{MerchantKey}}</merchantKey>
    </verification>
    <order>
        <recurringPayment>
            <processorID>1</processorID>
            <referenceNum>{{reference_num}}</referenceNum>
            <ipAddress>123.123.123.123</ipAddress>
            <customerIdExt>46674194662</customerIdExt>
            <billing>
                <name>Nome do comprador</name>
                <address>Rua teste, 0</address>
                <address2>11º Andar</address2>
                <district>Santo André</district>
                <city>São Paulo</city>
                <state>SP</state>
                <postalcode>00000-000</postalcode>
                <country>BR</country>
                <phone>(99) 99999-9999</phone>
                <email>teste@maxipago.com</email>
                <companyName>maxiPago!</companyName>
                <type>Individual</type>
                <gender>M</gender>
                <birthDate>1959-05-25</birthDate>
            </billing>
            <shipping>
                <name>Nome do comprador</name>
                <address>Rua teste, 0</address>
                <address2>11º Andar</address2>
                <district>Santo André</district>
                <city>São Paulo</city>
                <state>SP</state>
                <postalcode>00000-000</postalcode>
                <country>BR</country>
                <phone>(99) 99999-9999</phone>
                <email>teste@maxipago.com</email>
                <type>Individual</type>
                <gender>M</gender>
                <birthDate>1959-05-25</birthDate>
            </shipping>
            <transactionDetail>
                <payType>
                    <creditCard>
                        <number>5111111111111100</number>
                        <expMonth>12</expMonth>
                        <expYear>{{exp_year}}</expYear>
                        <cvvNumber>954</cvvNumber>
                    </creditCard>
                </payType>
            </transactionDetail>
            <payment>
                <chargeTotal>10.00</chargeTotal>
                <currencyCode>BRL</currencyCode>
            </payment>
            <recurring>
                <action>new</action>
                <startDate>{{start_date}}</startDate>
                <period>monthly</period>
                <frequency>1</frequency>
                <installments>12</installments>
                <firstAmount>10.00</firstAmount>
                <failureThreshold>15</failureThreshold>
                <onFailureAction>skip</onFailureAction>
            </recurring>
        </recurringPayment>
    </order>
</transaction-request>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<api-request>
    <verification>
        <merchantId>{{MerchantId}}</merchantId>
        <merchantKey>{{MerchantKey}}</merchantKey>
    </verification>
    <command>modify-recurring</command>
    <request>
        <orderID>{{order_id}}</orderID>
        <paymentInfo>
            <cardInfo>
                <creditCardNumber>5111111111111100</creditCardNumber>
                <expirationMonth>12</expirationMonth>
                <expirationYear>{{exp_year}}</expirationYear>
            </cardInfo>
            <chargeTotal>12.00</chargeTotal>
        </paymentInfo>
        <recurring>
            <processorID>1</processorID>
            <action>disable</action>
            <installments>10</installments>
            <nextFireDate>{{start_date}}</nextFireDate>
            <fireDay>20</fireDay>
            <period>quarterly</period>
            <lastDate>{{last_date}}</lastDate>
            <lastAmount>105.00</lastAmount>
        </recurring>
        <billingInfo>
            <name>Nome do comprador</name>
            <address1>Rua teste, 0</address1>
            <address2>11º Andar</address2>
            <city>São Paulo</city>
            <state>SP</state>
            <zip>00000000</zip>
            <country>BR</country>
            <phone>(99) 99999-9999</phone>
            <email>teste@maxipago.com</email>
        </billingInfo>
        <shippingInfo>
            <name>Nome do comprador</name>
            <address1>Rua teste, 0</address1>
            <address2>11º Andar</address2>
            <city>São Paulo</city>
            <state>SP</state>
            <zip>00000000</zip>
            <country>BR</country>
            <phone>(99) 99999-9999</phone>
            <email>teste@maxipago.com</email>
        </shippingInfo>
    </request>
</api-request>
